body.name: KIBAGA Decorative Wood Riser For Your Kitchen or Bathroom Farmhouse Decor - Beautiful Pedestal Stand Uniquely Displays Your Decorations - The Perfect Wooden Tray to Enhance Your Home Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: Beautifully Raise Your Farmhouse Decor To New Levels: From your bathroom to your kitchen - the decorative tray adds that extra special stylish flair to your home & works great as a sink organizer, decoration pedestal stand & more! Give your decor pieces, soap dispensers & more some height and the eye-catching display they deserve

Simply Charming In Modern Farmhouse Style: The adorable wood display stand in a distressed white look with black wooden feet is an amazing addition to any farmhouse decor! Use it as a unique centerpiece for the dining table, on a counter & more, but be prepared to receive lots of compliments for your new rustic masterpiece

Your Stylish Pedestal: KIBAGAs’ wood risers for decor & co. are built of wood and come with four screwable feet - your top-notch farmhouse pedestal-stand to beautify any room in your home to your taste

Endless Possibilities For Use: Where to start - there are so many options to use the cute wooden stand! Place it beside the sink to hold soap, use it as a kitchen stand for herbs and spices or as a rustic cake and pie stand, use in the hallway for small plants or to add a key bowl, in a bookshelf as a picture riser and you can even add some seasonal farmhouse decoration

The Perfect Size & Also Makes A Great Gift: The farmhouse decor pedestal has the best size (7.9x 5.8x 3.0”) to hold or display your favorite items around the house! With countless possibilities to use the wooden tray is a great gift for a housewarming party, birthday & other special occasions
body.description: KIBAGA Rustic Wooden Riser: An Eye-Catching & Versatile Centerpiece Around Your Home! Let’s take your favorite pieces to a new level! Thanks to the farmhouse pedestal stand you can hold & display your gorgeous farmhouse decor & other items in a beautiful unique way. The modern rustic look in distressed white with black feet makes the stand a wonderful addition to any farmhouse decor. Wodden stand with screwable feet you are receiving a durable gem that will enhance your interior for a long time to come. It’s good to know that there are no limits to creativity when it comes to the use of the pedestal stand. Thanks to its perfect size of 7.9x 5.8x 3.0” it is a true allrounder! One of the most popular uses of the stand is in the bathroom or kitchen next to the sink, as a riser for soap. However there are truly endless possibilities to make the most out of this cute farmhouse piece. Use it in the kitchen to display spices and herbs, for little plants or candles in the living room, as a picture riser in a bookshelf or create your own seasonal masterpiece and add some individual elements to spruce it up. Makes a wonderful gift: whether you go for the wooden pedestal on its own or add some handy pieces like a cute soap dispenser or other farmhouse decor items - the stand is a fantastic gift for a housewarming party, birthday or other celebrations! It’s time to elevate your decoration - the rustic wooden riser by KIBAGA is here to help you display your decorations in a super stylish & beautiful way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality!! Excellent addition to bathroom sink decor.package was on time nicely wrapped and even had a nice thank you note

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small light platform
reviews.reviewText: I do not use this for my bathroom. I use it as a riser in a charcuterie spread. It’s small, cute and light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little stand
reviews.reviewText: At first when I received it I thought it was flimsy. I like how the legs screw on and it actually is put together well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product in general looks good. Same as shown in the pictures. But my bad luck when I got the product, it was damaged and a screw was already broken. If the product wasn’t damaged at all it would’ve been a great addition to my washroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great durable products
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in bathroom! Just don’t get too much water on it fades color. I love it overall, ads a great touch to the decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for our new RV to put in the bathroom. It was perfect for what I wanted and needed. Just big enough to sit a small fake potted plant (ordered from AMAZON) and a bottle of Bath and Body Works hand soap. Doesn’t take up a lot of room but really looks so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little riser
reviews.reviewText: Small and perfect for a little lift on the counter. It’s just right, and doesn’t take up much space. Very lightweight.

When I had read the reviews, I had thought that this was just going to be a little stand and I was a little bit nervous about it because I wanted it to be the correct size for what I needed it for! When I opened it up I was pleasantly surprised because it was really great! The little note inside was super sweet as well, thank you 😀
Super cute! Good quality. Exactly as advertised.
Was expecting a solid pieceServers the purpose I had intended it forBut not worth the money
